TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextRange extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示两个 位置之间的所选内容。

span.span: Represents a selection of content between two positions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类引入了以下术语。The class introduces the following terminology. - **选择**-a 是**textpointer**指示的两个位置之间的内容选择。**Selection** - A is a selection of content between two positions indicated by **TextPointers**. 其中一个定位于所选内容的固定定位点, 而另一个位置是可移动的。One of these positions a fixed anchor with respect to the selection, while the other position is movable. 这类似于用户使用鼠标或键盘做出的选择。This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves. - **当前选择**-由于始终指示内容中的选定内容, 因此只需引用由 表示的选定内容即可。**Current Selection** - Because a always indicates a selection in content, it makes sense to simply refer to the selection indicated by a as the *current selection*. - **文本容器**-*文本容器*是窗体上的流内容最终边框的元素;指示的选择始终落在文本容器中。**Text Container** - A *text container* is the element that forms the ultimate border for the flow content at hand; the selection indicated by a always falls within a text container. 当前, 文本容器必须是或。Currently, a text container must be either a or a . - **文档**-文本容器中包含的内容统称为*文档*。**Document** - The content collectively contained within a text container is referred to as a *document*. 有关*位置*等其他相关术语的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information about other related terms like *position*, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 如何使用的属性来返回指定的纯文本表示形式。The following example demonstrates using the property of a to return the plain text representation of a specified . [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking two specified positions as the beginning and end positions for the new range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 textpointer 指示的两个位置之间进行选择。 A is formed from a selection between two positions indicated by **TextPointers**. 其中的一个位置 (由`position1`指示) 是根据选择固定的, 而另一个位置 (由`position2`表示) 是可移动的。One of these positions (indicated by `position1`) is fixed with respect to the selection, while the other position (indicated by `position2`) is movable. 这类似于用户使用鼠标或键盘做出的选择。This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves. 可以调整新的实际结尾, 以匹配适用于包含新的文档的任何选择试探法。The actual ends of the new may be adjusted to match any selection heuristics that are applicable to the document that contains the new . ## Examples 下面的示例演示构造函数的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the constructor. Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: stream
param.span: 包含要加载到当前所选内容中的数据的可读流。

span.span: A readable stream that contains data to load into the current selection.

param.name: dataFormat
param.span: 要将数据加载为的数据格式。

span.span: A data format to load the data as.

param.span: 当前支持的数据格式是 、、 和 。

span.span: Currently supported data formats are , , , and .

summary.span: 从指定流加载采用指定数据格式的当前所选内容。

span.span: Loads the current selection in a specified data format from a specified stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为`true` , 则会将内容从流的开头加载到流的末尾。 `stream`If is `true` for `stream`, content will be loaded from the beginning of the stream to the end of the stream. 否则, 将从当前流的末尾读取内容。Otherwise, content will be read from the current to the end of the stream. 此方法返回时, `stream`将保持打开状态, 中`stream`的当前位置不确定。When this method returns, `stream` is left open, and the current position within `stream` is undefined. 加载操作将当前所选内容替换为新加载的内容。A load operation replaces the current selection with the newly loaded content. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_loadsave)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_loadsave)]

summary.span: 将当前所选内容以指定数据格式保存到指定流中。

span.span: Saves the current selection to a specified stream in a specified data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回时, `stream`将保持打开状态, 中`stream`的当前位置不确定。When this method returns, `stream` is left open, and the current position within `stream` is undefined. 作为保存操作的一部分, 当前所选内容中的内容可能会转换为指定`dataFormat`的数据格式。As part of the save operation, content in the current selection may be converted to the data format specified by `dataFormat`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_loadsave)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_loadsave)]

span.span: Saves the current selection to a specified stream in a specified data format, with the option of preserving custom objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`preserveTextElements`为`false`, 则将自定义对象保存为已知类型。When `preserveTextElements` is `false`, custom objects are saved as known types. 例如, 假设你创建了一个名 `Heading1`为的自定义, 它继承自。For example, suppose you create a custom called `Heading1`, which inherits from . `preserveTextElements`当你在将设置为`Heading1` `false`时调用此方法时 , 会在保存时转换为。When you call this method with `preserveTextElements` set to `false`, `Heading1` is converted to a when the is saved. 在`preserveTextElements`将设置为`true`的情况下调用此`Heading1`方法时, 将保存而不进行转换。When you call this method with `preserveTextElements` set to `true`, `Heading1` is saved without being converted. 若要保留自定义文本`dataFormat`元素, 则必须将设置为。To preserve custom text elements, `dataFormat` must be set to . .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含当前所选内容的纯文本内容。

span.span: A string containing the plain text contents of the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性提取当前选定内容中的纯文本内容, 而不考虑可能存在的任何格式。Use this property to extract the plain text content in the current selection, regardless of any formatting that may be present. 对于此属性, 新的行字符和分段符将被视为等效。New line characters and paragraph breaks are treated as equivalent with respect to this property. 在读取此属性时, 当前选定内容中存在的任何类型的内容分隔符都将转换为新行。Any types of content breaks present in the current selection are converted to new lines when this property is read. ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]

exception.span: 当尝试将此属性设置为 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an attempt is made to set this property to .
